sentences.en: And then all ties were irksome, all earthly attachments unnecessary.
sentences.cn: 于是,一切联系都是讨厌的, 所有尘世的依附都无必要了.

sentences.en: But it is much really since these a few months a bit irksome.
sentences.cn: 但这几个月以来确实是多得有点令人厌烦.

sentences.en: I find it really irksome when people jump in front of me in a line.
sentences.cn: 当排队时有人在我前面插队,会令我十分生气.
我对那些限制感到很烦。

sentences.en: Indeed, the call to do so is often felt as irksome and joy - killing.
sentences.cn: 确实, 那样做的想法常使人感到厌倦和趣味索然.
那是件令人厌烦的工作.

sentences.en: It is irksome to listen to his constant complaints.
sentences.cn: 听他无休无止地抱怨真使人心烦.

sentences.en: It was too irksome to lie there, harassing my brain with a hundred idle misgivings.
sentences.cn: 躺在那儿是太烦神了, 有一百种没根据的忧虑困扰着我的头脑.
她总是发出令人厌烦的牢骚.

sentences.en: Suspense is irksome, disappointment , bitter, all the world has, some time or other.
sentences.cn: 焦虑不安真是苦恼,叫人厌倦, 扫兴, 人人都不免有时会有这种感觉.

sentences.en: There is certainly much work which is exceedingly irksome.
sentences.cn: 无疑有许多工作是令人极其生厌的.

sentences.en: What an irksome task the writing of long letters is.
sentences.cn: 写长信是多么令人讨厌的事情.
